sentences.en: A rifleman was racing out of the open door.
sentences.cn: 一名步兵正从打开的门中冲出来。

sentences.en: It is this rifleman who shot the enemy commander in chief.
sentences.cn: 是这个步枪射手打死了敌方的总司令.

sentences.en: Level 1 - 25 % of the time, the Rifleman deals 30 bonus damage.
sentences.cn: 一级-25%的几率爆头, 造成30点额外的伤害.晕眩0.01秒.

sentences.en: Level 2 - 30 % of the time , the Rifleman deals 30 bonus damage and stuns for. 1 seconds.
sentences.cn: 二级-30%的几率爆头, 造成30点额外的伤害. 晕眩0.1秒.

sentences.en: Refinery - Sell after the Harverster comes out. Send the Rifleman to protect your expansion.
sentences.cn: 矿厂 - 在矿车出来后卖掉. 派机枪兵去保护扩张点.

sentences.en: Rifleman Squad - This creates an anti - infantry machine gun on one of the hard - points of the MARV.
sentences.cn: 机枪兵 —— 这可以在MARV的 驻扎点上架设一挺 反 步兵机枪.

words.tran_cn: 抢劫；搜索；用步枪射击（rifle的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a man who uses a rifle
